name: Gravelock Elder
description: Other Gravelocks you control have +1 Health.
flavor: Gravelocks look up to their elders... literally.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Gravelock Raider
flavor: You can handle one or two, but before you know it, they're everywhere.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Infected Gravelock
description: Infected Gravelock has [Move] 0.
flavor: "It's seeping out of their god-damn pores."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

passiverules.name: Poisonous
passiverules.description: When a creature attacks Infected Gravelock in melee combat, or is damaged by Infected Gravelock, that creature becomes poisoned.

name: Gravehawk
description: Gravehawk gets +1 Attack for each Gravelock you control.
flavor: "Mom always said I'd end up in bad company. If she only knew..." \n- Ryssa, Gravehawk

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Elan Vital
flavor: Heal faster than you hurt and you'll keep fighting forever.

name: Crown of Strength
description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +2 Health.
flavor: The power of kings, imbued through discarded headwear.

name: Bear Paw
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack and +2 Health. When Bear Paw comes into play, enchanted unit's Countdown is increased by 1.
flavor: The gods saw fit to give it strong limbs and a mellow temperament.

name: Binding Root
description: Enchanted unit's [Move] is decreased by 2.
flavor: There's no better ally than the ground beneath your enemies.

name: Hymn
description: Target unit is fully [healed].
flavor: Music for those who can't dance.

name: Metempsychosis
description: Target unit you control is resummoned on the same tile. Its Countdown is set to its previous value.
flavor: Consider the egg. The image of unfulfilled potential, and you eat them for breakfast...

name: Thought Trap
description: Target unit's Countdown is doubled.
flavor: How far will a blind dog walk into a forest?

name: Rallying
description: Units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: FOLLOW THE JARL FOR THE KIN!

name: Brother of the Wolf
description: When Brother of the Wolf's Countdown is 0, you may increase Countdown by 2 to summon a\n<Ragged Wolf> on an adjacent tile.
flavor: Befriending wolves isn't hard. Failure, however, can be costly.

name: Callback
description: Target unit you control is returned to your hand.
flavor: Everyone deserves a second chance.

name: Catapult of Goo
description: Units attacked by Catapult of Goo have their Countdown increased by 2.
flavor: "I don't know if the piddlejacks are drivers or parasites on that infernal machine." \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Lobber: 4 tiles
passiverules.description: This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

name: Thunder Surge
description: Target unit and connected units are dealt 2 [magic damage].
flavor: Fear not the thunder. Fear the lightning.

name: Champion Ring
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack.
flavor: Hard to earn, even harder to carry.

name: Burn
description: Deal 3 [magic damage] to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "If you can't handle the fire, cool yourself in the kettle." \n- Old machine priest saying

name: Fertile Soil
description: Sacrifice target creature you control and draw 3 scrolls.
flavor: The Kinfolk don't mourn their dead; nature doesn't waste life.

name: Death Cap Berserk
description: When Death Cap Berserk comes into play, and at the beginning of its turns, enchanted creature's Countdown is decreased by 2 and it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor: "I love music. Especially wardrums." \n- Harald, Berserker

name: Destroyer
flavor: About to dodge? It's too late!

passiverules.name: Lobber: 4 tiles
passiverules.description: This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

name: Druid Burial Ground
description: At the beginning of your turn, adjacent units are [healed] by 1.
flavor: "I once saw two cats fighting next to such a monument. The fight lasted a week, then they starved to death."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

name: Quake
description: Deal 3 [magic damage] to all structures and 2 [magic damage] to all creatures.
flavor: No matter your skill, you can't parry the ground.

name: Inferno Blast
description: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target tile and adjacent tiles.
flavor: The power of ten men in one practical projectile.

name: Flip
description: Move target opponent unit to another tile on the same side.
flavor: A shift in perspective isn't always a good thing.

name: Frost Wind
description: Units on target tile and adjacent tiles have their Countdown increased by 1.
flavor: Packing an extra blanket is always good. Or five, if you're heading north.

name: Great Wolf
description: Great Wolf gets +1 Attack for each other Wolf you control.
flavor: The beasts have legends too.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Iron Ogre
flavor: Step aside or be disintegrated.

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: Physical damage dealt to Iron Ogre is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Junkyard
description: Rats you control have +1 Attack and +1 Health.
flavor: Rats aren't picky.

name: Kinfolk Brave
flavor: Braves are eager to prove their worth. The Jarls are happy to let them.

name: Kinfolk Jarl
description: Kinfolk Jarl has +1 Attack for each adjacent creature.
flavor: The strength of his people, crushing your people.

passiverules.name: Inspiring: +1 Attack
passiverules.description: When Kinfolk Jarl comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by +1 until end of turn.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Leeching Ring
description: When enchanted creature deals damage, it is [healed] by 2.
flavor: Search the ponds. Find one and your name is eternal.

name: Mangy Wolf
description: When Mangy Wolf comes into play, other Wolf creatures you control have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: "The fat wolf is not dangerous."\n- Kinfolk proverb

name: Dryadic Power
description: Enchanted creature gets +1 Attack and +3 Health, and its [Move] is decreased by 1.
flavor: The strength of a tree with the resolve of a rock.

name: Potion of Resistance
description: For 3 rounds, damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced to 1.
flavor: Sometimes you've just got to take the hit.

name: Pushback
description: Target unit is returned to its owner's hand.
flavor: You know you're not wanted when your body dissolves.

name: Ragged Wolf
flavor: Fast and feisty.

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

name: Kabonk
description: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target unit. Draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Ouch!

name: Shrine
description: Other units you control have +1 Health.
flavor: With a strong enough faith, you don't need gods for miracles.

name: Sinmarked Zealot
description: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Sinmarked Zealot to deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit.
flavor: When his time comes, so will yours.

abilities.name: Sacrifice Attack
abilities.description: Sacrifice this unit to deal 2 damage to target unit.

name: Sister of the Fox
description: When Sister of the Fox comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: The eyes and ears of the Jarl.

name: Royal Vanguard
description: When Royal Vanguard's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units get +2 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: Honor. Power. Axe.

name: Speed
description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 3.
flavor: They won't know what hit them.

name: Essence Feast
description: For each unit you control, [heal] your idol on the same row by 1. Beast creatures deal double damage to idols this turn.
flavor: Just like love, it can heal and hurt.

name: Pother
description: Target unit is moved to a random adjacent tile. Draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Now you're there, now you're not!

name: Unleash Inner Power
description: Target creature's Attack is increased by its Health value. Its Health is then set to 2.
flavor: My very essence shall be my blade.

name: Lifestealer
description: When Lifestealer deals damage, it is [healed] by 2.
flavor: One day he'll pay for these borrowed lives.

name: Eternal Statue
flavor: It's said some sculptors infuse their work with a life of its own.

passiverules.name: Regeneration 1
passiverules.description: Heals 1 each round, and removes poison.

name: Waking Stones
description: All damage dealt to Waking Stones is reduced to 1.
flavor: "The problem with stone is that it is stationary. We fixed that."\n- Uria, Geo Mage

name: Transposition
description: Switch places of two units you control. Draw 1 scroll.
flavor: You don't need powerful allies. You need allies in the right places.

name: Vitality Well
description: When Vitality Well's Countdown becomes 0, units you control are [healed] by 1.
flavor: Refreshing!

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

name: Blessing of Haste
description: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: A little bit of speed can make all the difference.

name: Ancestral Totem
description: Creatures you control have +1 Attack.
flavor: Kinfolk creations aren't always pleasant.

name: Copper Automaton
description: Copper Automaton is destroyed after attacking.
flavor: Explosively cute.

name: Spark
description: Deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit.
flavor: The smallest spark can cause a decent flame.

name: Cannon Automaton
flavor: wrrr wrrr clunk phssssht BwoooOOOM wrrr wrrr

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: Physical damage dealt to Cannon Automaton is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Bitter Root
description: When Bitter Root is attacked in [melee combat], the attacker becomes [poisoned].
flavor: "Sure, there's plenty to eat in the swamps. Shame it's all poisoned." \n- Gundar, Marsh Guide

name: Violent Dispersal
description: Deal 8 [magic damage] to target unit.
flavor: "When he said 'Disperse!' I thought he meant all of us. Turns out he was only addressing poor Mikal." \n- Mahts, Infantryman\n

name: Focus
description: Target creature gets +3 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: If it's worth killing, kill it good!

name: New Orders
description: Your units have their [Move] increased by 1 until end of turn.
flavor: REGROUP!

name: Honorable General
description: When Honorable General's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: Time and again, he has brought victory. The Empire's reward is war.

name: Kinfolk Veteran
flavor: It's tough getting old in this business.

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

name: Rumble
description: Each opponent unit is moved to a random adjacent tile.
flavor: Shaken, not crushed.

name: Fury
description: All units have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: Fanning the flames of battle.

name: Crimson Bull
description: Units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: Drink, and take flight!

name: Machine Priest
description: Machine Priest does not attack. Structures and Automatons you control have +1 Attack.
flavor: Deep within the mountainous assembly halls, the Litany Mechanica is sung day and night.

name: Ember Bonds
description: Enchanted unit is dealt 2 [magic damage] before attacking.
flavor: It's inevitable.

name: End of Reason
description: Sacrifice all units you control with a non-zero Countdown. Each unit sacrificed this way deals 2 [magic damage] to opponent units on the same row.
flavor: "You served me well as soldiers. Now serve me as projectiles!"\n- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Ether Pump
description: When Ether Pump attacks, opponent's units are dealt 1 [physical damage].
flavor: "I know what it looks like! Trust me. A few of these will win any siege." \n- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Golem Skin
description: When Golem Skin comes into play, enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of structures you control. Structures you control take 2 [magic damage].
flavor: When you wear machines, laundry day is your greatest worry.

name: Frost Gale
description: Deal 1 [magic damage] to all units.
flavor: Bad weather is a great weapon. If only you could aim it.

name: Magma Pack
description: When Magma Pack comes into play, enchanted unit's Attack is doubled. Enchanted unit is destroyed after attacking.
flavor: Don't worry, just push the button when you arrive.

name: Plate Armor
description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health.
flavor: "If only we had enough for everyone..."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Tick Bomb
description: Destroy target structure.
flavor: Sounds like tick, looks like tick.

name: Vitriol Aura
description: When enchanted creature deals damage to another creature, that creature becomes [poisoned].
flavor: Try not to breathe.

name: Eye of Eagle
description: Draw 1 creature scroll.
flavor: Strategy is nothing if you're blind.

name: Proximity Charge
description: When destroyed in [melee combat], attacking unit is dealt 4 [physical damage]. When Proximity Charge comes into play, a copy is summoned adjacent to it.
flavor: Tread lightly!

name: Frostbeard
description: When Frostbeard is destroyed in combat, units you control get +2 Attack until end of your next turn.
flavor: An honorable death is not to be mourned; it's a blessing.

name: Heritage
description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
flavor: "This way your life, or death, won't be a complete waste." \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Faith Blessing
description: Target unit you control takes 2 [magic damage]. Your idol on that row is healed by 4.
flavor: "It's an immense honor. Be grateful for it." \n- Pater Brecht

name: Nutrition
description: Sacrifice target unit you control and add that unit's cost to your [current] resources.
flavor: A cadaver for some, a feast for others.

name: Powerbound
description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
flavor: "I'll just borrow some life force when you don't need it anymore."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Gun Automaton
flavor: A special kind of turtle.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Vengeance Veil
description: When enchanted unit takes damage, its Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: All is blood from behind the crimson veil.

name: Useless Contraption
flavor: Working as intended.

name: Purification
description: Remove all enchantments and [effects] from target unit.
flavor: The innocence of youth can cleanse the corrupt.

name: Ranger's Bane
description: Enchanted creature becomes [poisoned].
flavor: You haven't really died until you've been slowly strangled by poisonous roots.

name: Horn of Ages
description: Opponent units have their [Move] decreased by 1 until end of their turn.
flavor: You're thankful for surviving battles past, until you crumble under the weight of the memories.

name: Mire Curse
description: Mire Curse deals 1 [poison damage] to adjacent creatures at the beginning of each of its turns.
flavor: It's putrid, but it's home.

name: Faith Chains
description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, Faith Chains deals 1 damage to opponent idols.
flavor: "The chains weigh heavier on them, my son." \n- Pater Brecht

name: Bloodboil
description: When enchanted unit takes damage, it gets +2 Attack.
flavor: AURRGH... YOU... I... KILL RAAAHH!!

name: Summons
description: Draw 1 structure scroll.
flavor: "We need more stuff!" \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Scattergunner
flavor: "He was carrying WHAT?!"\n- Mahts, Infantryman

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Law Memorial
description: When Law Memorial's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and Order is increased by 1.
flavor: You'd think a people so fond of writing would remember the words of their ancestors.

name: Desert Memorial
description: When Desert Memorial is destroyed, increase Energy by 1.
flavor: Breakers against the eroding waves of time.

name: Tribal Memorial
description: Pay 2 Energy to destroy Tribal Memorial and increase Growth by 1.
flavor: Lest we forget the times of peace.

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 2 Energy to destroy ${NAME} and increase Growth by 1.

name: Woodland Memorial
description: When you play a spell or enchantment, Woodland Memorial is destroyed. Increase Growth by 1.
flavor: The Kinfolk have forgotten, but the trees remember.

name: Sand Pact Memorial
description: When Sand Pact Memorial comes into play, increase [current] Energy by 5.
flavor: Like grains of sand in an hourglass, our memories fade over time.

name: Stone Pact Memorial
description: When Stone Pact Memorial comes into play, increase Order by 1.
flavor: We remember the times, but not the promises.

name: Illthorn Seed
description: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, summon an <Illthorn> in its place.
flavor: This corpse brings its own flowers to the funeral.

name: Illthorn
flavor: "Look, Barbra. Wires!" \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Spiky 1
passiverules.description: When Illthorn is attacked in melee combat, Illthorn deals 1 physical damage to attacking unit.

name: Decimation
description: Units on target row are dealt 1 [magic damage]. Opponent's idol on that row is dealt 2 damage.
flavor: One by one by one they fall, and now we've reached the Cobalt Hall...

name: God Hand
description: Units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn, and have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: Howl for the gods!

name: Hellspitter Mortar
description: Attacks a randomly selected tile on opponent's board.
flavor: Aim? With enough power you don't need aim.

passiverules.name: Lobber: 1 tile
passiverules.description: This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

name: Knight Scholar
description: When Knight Scholar's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Knowledge is strength.

name: Obelisk
flavor: Good for leaning on. And hiding behind...

name: Ducal Infantryman
description: Other creatures you control on the same row have +1 Attack.
flavor: Strength in numbers.

name: Ducal Skirmisher
flavor: Slice and dice!

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Ducal Spearman
flavor: If you bait them, they will come.

passiverules.name: Spiky 3
passiverules.description: When Ducal Spearman is attacked in melee combat, Ducal Spearman deals 3 physical damage to attacking unit.

name: Resonant Helm
flavor: You'll hear the silent whispers of magic and it will change you.

name: Crossbowman
flavor: Locked, loaded, and lying in wait...

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Royal Infantryman
description: Other creatures you control on the same row have +1 Health.
flavor: Yes, my Liege. I'll protect them, my Liege.

name: Royal Skirmisher
flavor: Double the swords, double the fun!

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Royal Spearman
flavor: HOOOOOLLLD!

passiverules.name: Spiky 3
passiverules.description: When Royal Spearman is attacked in melee combat, Royal Spearman deals 3 physical damage to attacking unit.

name: Bunny
description: If Bunny's Attack is 0, it will summon another Bunny in an adjacent tile instead of attacking.
flavor: Cute, crafty, and quick to procreate.

name: Gravelock Outcast
description: Pay 1 Growth to fully [heal] Gravelock Outcast.
flavor: "Cast out from gravelock society? Wow, that's some feat."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Heal self to full health for one Growth

name: Tethered Recruit
description: When Tethered Recruit is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
flavor: "Its mind is muddled, but its heart is still with the army."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

name: Darkstrike
description: Deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, increase Decay by 1.
flavor: When darkness envelops, life abandons.

name: Efficiency
description: Target unit gets +2 Attack until end of turn. If that unit destroys another unit this turn, increase Energy by 1.
flavor: The best discipline conserves energy.

name: Erode
description: Target structure is dealt 2 [magic damage]. Increase Decay by 1.
flavor: From life, destruction. From ashes, life.

name: Return To Nature
description: Creatures on target tile and adjacent tiles get -1 Health until end of turn. If a creature with this effect is destroyed, increase Growth by 1.
flavor: Wither and begin anew.

name: Blast Strike
description: When enchanted creature deals damage, units adjacent to its target are dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor: "Needs more brutal."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Rigged
description: When enchanted structure is destroyed in [melee combat], its attacker is dealt 4 [physical damage].
flavor: Strap it on, then stand back.

name: Overdrive
description: When Overdrive comes into play, and at the beginning of its turns, enchanted structure's Countdown is decreased by 2 and it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor:
"I know it'll break. I just
don't care."
- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Plating
description: Enchanted unit disregards next attack or damage taken. Plating is removed afterwards.
flavor: Almost works like real armor.

name: Iron Whip
description: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target unit. It gets +1 Attack until end of turn, and its Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: A whip for steel hides.

name: Incendiaries
description: Deal 3 [magic damage] to all opponent structures.
flavor: It's raining cats and bombs.

name: Redesign
description: Target creature's Attack and Health switch values.
flavor: "Trust me, it's better this way."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

name: Desperation
description: Target creature gets +2 Attack until end of turn for each opponent unit on the same row. It is then dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor: Many a conqueror have been surprised by the ferocity of desperate defenders.

name: Blind Rage
description: Target creature deals [magic damage] equal to its Countdown to adjacent units. Its Countdown is then increased by 1.
flavor: When you're seeing red, friends and foes look the same.

name: Machination Mindset
description: Enchanted melee creature gets [Relentless] and +1 Attack.
flavor: No doubt, no fear, no thought.

name: Concentrate Fire
description: Target Ranged or Lobber unit makes an extra attack after its next attack.
flavor: Double the fire, double the fun.

name: Tool Initiate
description: When Tool Initiate's Countdown is 0, you may increase its Countdown by 1 to give target structure +1 Attack.
flavor: "Let me just tweak this..."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

name: Metal Heart
description: Target creature gains Attack equal to the number of structures on that side until end of turn.
flavor: More machines, more mayhem.

name: Bombard
description: Ranged or Lobber units on target tile and adjacent tiles have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: FIRE AT WILL!

name: Clock Library
description: When Clock Library's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and you draw 3 scrolls.
flavor: Tick. Tick. Tick. Tick...

name: Wildling
description: When a creature comes into play adjacent to Wildling, Wildling is dealt 1 [pure damage] and gets +1 Attack.
flavor: Sometimes you just want to be left alone.

name: Mangonel
description: When Mangonel comes into play, your Mangonels' Countdowns are\nset to the lowest of any you control.
flavor: Powerful, portable, and packing a punch.

passiverules.name: Lobber: 4 tiles
passiverules.description: This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

name: Vaettr of the Wild
description: While Vaettr of the Wild is in play, Growth is increased by 1.
flavor: The forest personified. Cute.

name: Imperial Resources
description: Draw 2 scrolls. Your idols are [healed] by 1. Increase Order by 1.
flavor: From the furthest reaches of the Empire, they hauled their gear. Now, the time has come to use it.

name: Divine Mark
description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it is returned to owner's hand. If it was destroyed by damage from another unit, that unit is returned to its owner's hand.
flavor: "Let's try that again."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Unbind
description: Destroy target enchanted unit.
flavor: What once was no longer is.

name: Charge Coil
description: When Charge Coil attacks, a random opponent unit is dealt 1 [physical damage].
flavor: "This is extremely annoying."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

name: Viscera Sage
description: When Viscera Sage destroys another unit, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Reading entrails takes a strong stomach.

name: Loyal Darkling
description: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Loyal Darkling.
flavor: To night, she'll return.

passiverules.name: Unstable 2
passiverules.description: When Loyal Darkling is destroyed, it deals 2 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

name: Husk
flavor: Hollow, haggard, happy to help.

name: Mire Shambler
description: Before attacking, Mire Shambler moves to a random adjacent tile.
flavor: "From the depths of the mire, the Masked appeared." \n- Excerpt, Ilmire Journal II

name: Mangy Rat
flavor:
Tiny Merchants
Trader of Graves
Death's Servants
Fate's Knaves

passiverules.name: Poisonous
passiverules.description: When a creature attacks Mangy Rat in melee combat, or is damaged by Mangy Rat, that creature becomes poisoned.

name: Ilmire Witch Doctor
description: When a Human creature adjacent to Ilmire Witch Doctor is destroyed, a <Husk> is summoned in its place.
flavor: "I can't promise you eternal life, but I can keep you standing."

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Blightbearer
description: Blightbearer takes 1 [poison damage] before attacking. When Blightbearer is destroyed, all creatures on the same row become [poisoned].
flavor: In this army, illness is no excuse.

name: Puppet Soldier
description: When Puppet Soldier is destroyed in combat, all units on the same row are destroyed.
flavor: The soldier is false. The fear is not.

name: Pillar of Disease
description: Opponent units on the same row have -1 Attack.
flavor: The Ilmire provides for its own.

name: Animovore
description: Enchant unit you control. When a unit adjacent to enchanted unit is destroyed, enchanted unit is dealt 1 [pure damage] and you draw 1 scroll.
flavor: I'll take a piece of your mind, if you don't mind.

name: Harvester
description: Does not count down. When a creature is destroyed, Harvester's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: We've learnt to live, and die, with the Harvesters.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Totem of Suffering
description: When a creature you control is destroyed, the opposing idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
flavor: Empathy can be a cruel thing.

name: Soul Scrounger
description: When a creature is destroyed, enchanted unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: Those who have fallen act through the living.

name: Grisly Graft
description: Enchant creature you control. When Grisly Graft comes into play, sacrifice adjacent creatures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of creatures sacrificed.
flavor: Great needlework!

name: Arthritis
description: Each time enchanted unit deals damage, it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor: You're only as old as you feel.

name: Restless Bones
description: Undead units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn, and their Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: "Angering the dead is no trivial task." \n- Grahm, Animator

name: Tempo Theft
description: Two target units switch Countdown values.
flavor: No refund upon completed transaction.

name: Shroud of Unlife
description: When Shroud of Unlife comes into play, enchanted creature becomes Undead. When enchanted creature is destroyed, a <Husk> is summoned in its place.
flavor: "You'll not find warmth in this garb." \n- Tobai, Bone Merchant

name: Damning Curse
description: Destroy target creature. Units you control are dealt 1 [magic damage].
flavor: When someone else is paying, who cares about the price?

name: Languid
description: Enchanted unit's Attack is decreased by 2. When Languid comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Play nice!

name: Energy Siphon
description: When Energy Siphon comes into play, increase [current] Energy by 3. Enchanted creature gets -1 Attack and -1 Health.
flavor: Resources are everywhere. It's just a matter of extraction.

name: Brain Lice
description: Enchanted creature becomes [poisoned]. When it is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Scratch all you want. The itch is in your head.

name: Searing Shackles
description: Enchanted unit deals 1 damage to the idol behind it at the end of each of its turns. When enchanted unit moves, it is dealt 2 [magic damage].
flavor: Death is the only escape.

name: Miasma Well
description: When Miasma Well's Countdown becomes 0, a random opponent creature becomes poisoned.
flavor: DO NOT DRINK.

name: Pillar of Fatigue
description: When a creature moves, its Countdown is increased by 1.
flavor: What good are tactics when your men can't lift their swords?

name: Infectious Blight
description: When Infectious Blight comes into play, enchanted creature becomes [poisoned]. If it is destroyed by poison, a random creature on the same side gets Infectious Blight.
flavor: \nThe plague does\nnot discriminate.

name: Necrogeddon
description: Sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures sacrificed this way are replaced by <Husks> at Countdown 0.
flavor: "This won't do. Lets start over."\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

name: Beast Rat
flavor: "Oh look how big they are compared to those in the city!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

name: Soul Steal
description: Destroy target creature with health 2 or less. Summon a <Mire Shambler> on a random tile on your side.
flavor: Ilmire mercy is worse than death.

name: Regeniture
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Health. When Regeniture comes into play, the idol behind it is dealt 1 damage.
flavor: Sometimes you can squeeze blood from a stone.

name: Draining Mist
description: All opponent units with Countdown 1 or less have their Countdown increased by 2.
flavor: "Wait, I have an idea!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

name: Roasted Bean Potion
description: Target creature's Countdown is decreased by 1. Its [Move] is increased by 1 until end of turn.
flavor: It's an acquired taste. By the barrel from far Dyrra.

name: Oblivion Seeker
description: When Oblivion Seeker is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
flavor: He leaves nothing but memories.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Ilmire Rot Eater
description: When a creature adjacent to Ilmire Rot Eater is destroyed, Ilmire Rot Eater gets +1 Attack and +1 Health.
flavor: Corpses are surprisingly nutritious.

name: Ilmire Hunter
flavor: Like the mire, Hunters kill without mercy.

passiverules.name: Slayer
passiverules.description: When Ilmire Hunter deals damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.

name: Scavenger Construct
description: When an adjacent unit is destroyed, Scavenger Construct gets +2 Health.
flavor: "Feed the Construct!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

name: Atrophy
description: Target unit's Attack is set to 0 until end of opponent's next turn. It cannot be increased during this time.
flavor: It usually takes longer.

name: Cluster Hex
description: All units on target tile and adjacent tiles get [Curse] 2.
flavor: Curse upon you, and your children, and their children for seven generations.

name: Cursemonger
description: When Cursemonger's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to give target unit [Curse] 2.
flavor: "Needles and bones, my darling, that's my trade."

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Pestis
description: Enchanted creature has +1 Attack for each Rat on that side. When enchanted creature destroys another unit, summon a <Mangy Rat> on a random tile the same side.
flavor: There's no virtue among vermin.

name: Hex Marks
flavor: It's not just about looks.

name: Noaidi
flavor: For the Kinfolk, the moose migration marks the beginning of the new year.

passiverules.name: Replenish
passiverules.description: When Noaidi is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Noaidi.

name: Solemn Giant
description: Does not count down. Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2.
flavor: "The Giants are no more, so we made new ones."\n-Amhan, Machine Master\n

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2

name: Dust Runner
description: When Dust Runner deals damage to a creature with 3 or less Health, that creature is destroyed.
flavor: "Kinfolk make for great\ntarget practice."\n- Sarh, Dust Runner

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Wings Shield
description: Wings Shield has [Armor] equal to the number of units behind it.
flavor: "I shield those I love. From them I draw strength."

name: Automata Forge
description: Instead of attacking, Automata Forge summons a <Gun Automaton>\non an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.
flavor: Kadum... pssht!

abilities.name: Pay 3 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1

name: Stag Heart
description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +1 Health for each Stag Heart on the same side.
flavor: The Kinfolk judge every beast on their own merits.

name: Faith Duty
description: Enchant unit you control. At the end of each of its turns, enchanted unit is dealt 1 [pure damage], and opponent units on that row get their Countdown increased by 1.
flavor: Willingly, but not wisely.

name: Metal Wonder
description: When your opponent plays a spell or enchantment, Metal Wonder deals 2 damage to a random idol they control.
flavor: Machine victory, no fiddly bits.

name: Crone
description: Crone does not attack. When Crone is destroyed in combat, the attacking unit is destroyed.
flavor: "Grandma in the front. The hag's time is up."\n- Halm, Berserker

name: Breaker
description: When Breaker deals damage, it gets +1 Attack.
flavor: Where Breakers go,\nonly twigs remain.

name: Oak Blood
description: Enchanted creature gets +6 Health.
flavor: Trading with Vilewood trees is never a bargain.

name: Fierce Tactics
description: Your melee creatures become [Relentless] until end of turn.
flavor: "They have the weapons, but we have the will!"\n- Halm, Berserker

name: Rat King
description: Target tile and adjacent tiles. Summon three <Beast Rats> within the spell's area.
flavor: Obey the Jarl, but fear the King.

name: Appurtenance
description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health for each Beast you control.
flavor: They have their leaders, nature has hers.

name: Berserker
description: When Berserker takes damage, Berserker's gets +1 Attack.
flavor: "No. We only fight for Kav."\n- Halm, Berserker.

passiverules.name: Regeneration 1
passiverules.description: Heals 1 each round, and removes poison.

name: Sister of the Bear
flavor: "Honored Sisters. Your strength will be my hammer against the hated Empire!"\n- Jarl Urhald

name: Kinfolk Ranger
flavor: Many of the ghost stories told about the deeper woods can probably be attributed to the stealthy rangers.

name: Owl
flavor: Hoot. Hoot?

passiverules.name: Flying
passiverules.description: Owl can move to any tile. If that tile is not adjacent to Owl, its Countdown is increased by 1.

name: Sister of the Owl
description: An <Owl> is summoned together with Sister of the Owl. When an Owl deals damage, Sister of the Owl gets +1 Attack.
flavor: Knowing and nocturnal.

name: Storm Runner
flavor: Storm Runners have perfected the art of... throwing.

passiverules.name: Lobber: 4 tiles
passiverules.description: This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

name: State Machine
description: When a creature comes into play on opponent's side, State Machine deals 1 [magic damage] to that creature. When State Machine's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed.
flavor: Originally intended to roast beans.

name: Supercharged
description: At the beginning of each of enchanted unit's turns, enchanted unit makes a ranged attack dealing 1 [physical damage].
flavor: It's not like they know how it works, exactly... but it's certainly useful.

name: Machine Chant
description: Deal [magic damage] to target unit equal to the number of structures you control. Increase Energy by 1.
flavor: "It's an odd song for sure. Just wait for the crescendo!" \n- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Scout Automaton
description: Other Automatons you control have +1 Attack.
flavor: No machine is complete without its smallest gears.

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: Physical damage dealt to Scout Automaton is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Magnetizer
description: Any unit hit by Magnetizer gets its Countdown increased by 1.
flavor: Power is relative. A sleeping enemy is a harmless enemy.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Mystic Altar
description: When Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown and increase Countdown of target creature you control by 2 to draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Learning takes time.

abilities.name: Mystic Altar
abilities.description: Target unit you control has its countdown increased by 2. Draw a scroll.

name: Redeploy
description: Swap two target rows on your side.
flavor: "Wings to the east, vanguard south. Go!"

name: Caller's Bane
description: When enchanted unit deals damage to an idol during combat, other idols on that side are dealt 1 damage.
flavor: Each idol is strongly linked to its Caller.

name: Aging Knight
description: Each time Aging Knight attacks, its [base Countdown] is increased by 1.
flavor: The last thing a warrior learns is patience.

name: Royal Banner
description: All non-Human units get Countdown increased by 2 after attacking.
flavor: Where the banner goes, the Empire soon follows.

name: Fleetness
description: Enchanted unit's [base Countdown] is decreased by 1.
flavor: Faster is better than Stronger.

name: Machinated
description: Enchanted creature gets +5 Attack, and its [base Countdown] is doubled.
flavor: Man shall become metal.

name: Corrode
description: Units deal double damage to idols until end of turn. If a unit destroys an idol this turn, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Even the Machines know heresy.

name: Wings Soldier
flavor: The elites of the Empire strike with precision.

name: Vigor Extraction
description: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. If Countdown is then 4 or more, increase Decay by 1.
flavor: The life of another, put to better use.

name: Wicked Being
flavor: There are no innocents in the Mire.

name: Refined Strategy
description: Move target structure you control to another tile on that side. Its Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: "Perhaps we should move the catapults to the ridge?"

name: Siege Cracker
flavor: What do you mean, "bombs for hands"?

passiverules.name: Idol strike 5
passiverules.description: When Siege Cracker deals damage to an idol during combat, that idol is dealt an additional 5 damage.

name: Ripper
flavor: "I was taught to be ready!"

name: Unforeseen Onslaught
description: Creatures you control with Attack 1 or less get [Slayer] until end of turn.
flavor: 'Tis just a scratch.

name: Ilmire Tribesman
flavor: Fighting for their kin, alive or dead.

name: Pest Dissimulator
description: When Pest Dissimulator deals damage to a creature, that creature and adjacent creatures become [poisoned].
flavor: Don't try and find me.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Monstrous Brood
description: Creatures you control with the same name as target creature are sacrificed, and each replaced by a <Monstrosity>.
flavor: A second birth. A new life. More teeth.

name: Monstrosity
description: Monstrosity gets +1 Attack for each adjacent Monstrosity, and -1 Attack for other adjacent creatures.
flavor: Twisted. Transformed. Terrifying.

name: Fungify
description: Enchanted creature gets +5 Health, and its [base Countdown] is increased by 1.
flavor: "Nightmarish stuff,\nbut damn, it works." \n- Isurd, Scryer

name: Ire And Bile
description: All units get [Curse] 1 and +1 Attack until end of opponent's turn.
flavor: A conflict is easier to start than it is to end.

name: Sickening Fumes
description: Until end of opponent's turn, opponent units have their attack decreased by 3.
flavor: It's not weather. It's miasma density.

name: Uneasy Alliance
description: Enchanted creature gets +2 Attack. When it is destroyed, all other creatures with Uneasy Alliance are destroyed.
flavor: This won't end well.

name: Bloodline Taint
description: Target unit, and other units on the same side that share a subtype, get [Curse] 1.
flavor: A cruel legacy.

name: Watcher
description: When a unit adjacent to Watcher is destroyed by non-combat damage or death effects, Watcher deals 2 damage to a random opponent idol.
flavor: The Harvester's wrath lingers even after death.

name: Wings Captain
description: When Wings Captain's Countdown becomes 0, Wings Captain and adjacent Soldiers have their [Move] increased by 1 until end of turn.
flavor: "Flanking maneuver!"\n- Ays, Wings Captain

name: Eager Scryer
description: If Eager Scryer's Countdown is 2 or more at the end of your turn, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "I deal in confusion. I buy it from you, and sell it to your enemy."\n- Isurd, Scryer

name: Cannonetta
flavor: "T- the bullet went through clean. I'll be fine."\n- Aru, now deceased

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Untainted
description: Enchanted unit has [Ward].
flavor: Those who do not want can not be corrupted.

name: Machine Divinator
description: Machine Divinator does not attack. Structures you control have +1 Health. When Machine Divinator's Countdown becomes 0, a [random] structure you control has its Countdown decreased by 1.

name: Beetle Stone
description: When another Beetle Stone comes into play, 2 damage is dealt to a random opponent idol. Beetle Stone is then placed at the top of your library.
flavor: The beetles were extremely popular once.

name: Eclipse
description: All your [current] resources are converted into Decay.
flavor: "And then, all over the realm, it was dark..."

name: Ancestral Pact
description: When a unit you control is destroyed during your opponent's turn, draw 1 scroll, and Ancestral Pact counts down by 1.
flavor: We fear no death.

name: Piercing Projectile
description: Enchanted ranged creature gets [Piercing] and +1 Attack.
flavor: "With these, you'll get through the strongest armor."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

name: Stifled Advance
description: Enchanted unit's [base Countdown] is increased by 2. When Stifled Advance comes into play, enchanted unit's Countdown is increased by 2.
flavor: "They can't attack us if they're busy dodging arrows."

name: Blightseed
description: Target creature you control has its Countdown increased by 2. If it is still on the board at the beginning of your next turn, draw 2 scrolls and increase [current] Decay by 2.
flavor: \n"Take two of these and come see me tomorrow."\n- Yon, Witch Doctor

name: Morbid Curiosity
description: When enchanted creature destroys another creature, enchanted unit's owner draws 1 scroll.
flavor: "Show me your organs, and I will tell you who you were."

name: Stitcher
description: When Stitcher's Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice target creature to give another target creature +2 Attack and +2 Health. If you do, Stitcher's Countdown is reset.

abilities.name: Stitch
abilities.description: Sacrifice target creature to increase another target creature's Attack and Health by 2.

name: Arhart's Disciple
description: When Arhart's Disciple deals damage to a unit, opponent's idol on the same row is dealt 1 damage.
flavor: "Fresh canvas! She'll be pleased."

name: Blade Husk
flavor: Created to kill without remorse.

passiverules.name: Dominion: [Relentless]
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

name: Bog Hound
flavor: Playing fetch is far more interesting when there are multiple limbs to choose from.

passiverules.name: Dominion: +3 Attack
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

name: Festering Freak
flavor: Sometimes, the Masked get it wrong.

passiverules.name: Poisonous
passiverules.description: When a creature attacks Festering Freak in melee combat, or is damaged by Festering Freak, that creature becomes poisoned.

name: Corpus Collector
description: When Corpus Collector destroys a creature, summon a <Husk> with 2 Countdown on an adjacent tile.
flavor: "Alas, this one's no good. Not enough arms."\n- Orren, Corpus Collector

name: Baleful Witch
description: When Baleful Witch comes into play, any [Curses] on creatures in play are [triggered].
flavor: Her power is drawn from the purest spite.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Soldier's Bond
description: When enchanted unit takes damage, units behind it have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: One for all. All for naught.

name: Pilgrim's Feet
description: When enchanted creature moves, it is [healed] by 2.
flavor: "I don't need shoes. I have faith."

name: Reversal
description: Frontmost and rearmost units on one side of target row switch places. Draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "The right tool for the right job. And you tools are in the wrong place!"

name: Cursed Presence
description: Target unit gets [Curse] 3.
flavor: "The nearby plants withered, and the birds fell silent. No one dared approach."

name: Fulmination Conduit
description: Fulmination Conduit counts up instead of down at the beginning of its turn. You may sacrifice it to add its Countdown to your [current] Energy.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Add current Countdown to your current Energy.

name: Nuru, Flesh-seamstress
description: Nuru does not attack. When Nuru's Countdown becomes 0, summon 2 <Husks> with Countdown 0 at random positions. The Husks are destroyed after attacking.

passiverules.name: Dominion: Undead creatures you
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Malevolent Gaze
description: Target creature's [Move] is decreased by 2 until end of its turn. It gets [Curse] 2.
flavor: Malice, pure and unguarded.

name: Gallant Defender
description: As long as you have no more units than your opponent, Gallant Defender has [Armor] 2.
flavor: "Hold the walls! Protect your own!"\n- Cay, Royal Envoy

name: Hired Smuggler
flavor: "Got your parts, ahyup."

passiverules.name: Pillage: Draw 1 structure scro
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Power Trip
description: Increase [current] Energy by 6. If it is then 11 or more, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "We need more."\n"But-"\n"MORE!"

name: Ash Runner
flavor: Looks are important to runners. To some, more than others.

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Echomaton
description: When an opponent plays a spell, Echomaton gets +2 Attack. When Echomaton is destroyed, if Attack is 3 or more, increase Energy by 1.
flavor: The perfect pet for a priest.

name: Boom Reaver
flavor: "Why's he carrying a ship's cannon?"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Ironclad Reaver
flavor: "I've always liked brawling. It's my favorite game."\n- Reaver Khaplan

passiverules.name: Pillage: Immune to damage unti
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Replicaton
description: When Replicaton is destroyed, return to owner's hand if your [current] Energy is 2 or more.
flavor: You only need one. Of course, use more if you've got them.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Sudden Eruption
flavor: "Too frequent by far, and utterly horrifying."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian

name: Outcast Rebel
flavor: Ill-tempered and bad-mannered. No wonder the braves love him.

name: Culling the Flock
description: Sacrifice target Beast. Other Beasts you control have their Attack increased by that unit's Attack until end of turn, and become fully [healed].
flavor: The laws of beasts are harsh.

name: Earthen Testament
description: Enchanted units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: Few can best the Kinfolk on their own soil.

name: Vengeful Vaettr
flavor: Not so cute anymore.

passiverules.name: Pillage: Increase Growth by 1.
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Bountiful Times
description: Summon a <Bunny> on target tile. Other Bunnies have their Countdown decreased by 2.
flavor: "But... there were only a handful yesterday!"

name: Verdant Veil
description: Enchanted creature gets +3 Health. As long as its Health is no less than its [base Health], it has [Ward].
flavor: "I swear! I saw a person in there!"

name: Underdog's Spite
description: Creatures you control with Attack 2 or less have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: As they dragged him out of the forest, the dagger was still lodged in his shoulder.

name: Wetland Ranger
flavor: With Ilmire warring against the Empire, the rangers were put to use where needed.

passiverules.name: Pillage: Your units get +1 Att
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Jarl Urhald
flavor: All Jarls inspire loyalty and courage. Urhald lives it,\nbreathes it.

passiverules.name: Inspiring: +2 Attack
passiverules.description: When Urhald comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by +2 until end of turn.

passiverules.name: Pillage: Urhald's Countdown is
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Wings Warder
description: Wings Warder does not attack. Other units you control on the same row have [Ward].
flavor: Not all armor is physical.

name: Tempest Reaver
description: Tempest Reaver's Attack is increased by your [current] Energy resource.
flavor: Managing power, one shot at a time.

passiverules.name: Armor 1
passiverules.description: Physical damage dealt to Tempest Reaver is reduced by 1.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Hired Marksman
description: When Hired Marksman's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to deal 3 [physical damage] to target creature.
flavor: \n"I aim for your heart."

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Vicious Strike
flavor: The Reavers know a good fight when they see one.

name: Earthborn Mystic
description: Enchanted creatures you control have +1 Attack. When Earthborn Mystic's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to draw an enchantment scroll. If you do, Earthborn Mystic is dealt 1 [pure damage].

abilities.name: Draw Enchantment
abilities.description: Draw an Enchantment scroll. Take 1 damage.

name: Earthbond
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Health.
flavor: The Earthborn don't budge.

name: Seed of Insurgency
description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it's resummoned on the same tile. Its Countdown is set to 1.
flavor: Some wars, you just don't quit.

name: Wings Spear
flavor: The Spears are taught the true power of patience.

passiverules.name: Dominion: Spiky increased by 2
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

passiverules.name: Spiky 2
passiverules.description: When Wings Spear is attacked in melee combat, Wings Spear deals 2 damage to attacking unit.

name: Wings Cleaver
flavor: "We don't start fights. We finish them."\n- Shim, Wings Cleaver

passiverules.name: Dominion: +3 Attack. [Base Cou
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Striped Fangbear
description: As long as opponent controls any Humans, Striped Fangbear is [Relentless] and has +3 Attack.
flavor: The Sisters don't really train fangbears. They simply encourage their natural hate of knights and soldiers.

name: Righteous Partisan
description: When Righteous Partisan comes into play, if you have no more units than your opponent, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "My home, my war."

name: Nuru's Needle
description: Enchanted unit's Attack, Health and [Move] are decreased by 1. It gets [Curse] 1.
flavor: "Life is my craft. The dead and dying, my canvas."\n- Nuru

name: Unground
description: Any time an idol takes damage, enchanted unit is dealt [magic damage] equal to half that amount (rounded down).
flavor: "Whether we know it or not, we all draw upon the earth."

name: Wings Charger
flavor: Subtlety was never her strong suit.

name: Infiltrate
description: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. Draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "Create a diversion. I'll snag the map."

name: Ruse
description: Units you control have [Spiky] 2.
flavor: "The Kin is a weed in our Imperial garden. It musn't grow."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Cay, Royal Envoy
description: At the end of your turn, if an opponent unit was destroyed in combat, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: \n"The sharpest mind I know. Wasted on war without surcease."\n- Aos, Royal Scribe

passiverules.name: Dominion: [Ward]
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Warding Stone
description: When Warding Stone is destroyed in combat, attacking unit is returned to owner's hand and you draw 1 scroll.
flavor: "You bring your toys, mystic. I'll bring mine."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

name: Prisoners of War
description: Draw 1 Growth, 1 Decay and 1 Energy creature. Increase [current] Wild by 1.
flavor:
"We don't need reserves.
We have prisoners."
- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist.

name: Electrify
description: Each structure you control makes a ranged attack dealing 1 [physical damage].
flavor: "Let's see what happens if we connect these two."\n -Arran, Machine Priest

name: Top Reaver Thea
flavor: "Never fear, Thea's here."

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.

passiverules.name: Pillage: Your [current] Energy
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Reaping Mask
description: Enchanted unit gets +3 Attack and +3 Health. When enchanted unit destroys a creature, draw a creature scroll.
flavor: Its promise cannot be resisted for long. Nor can its hunger.

name: Eternal Sword
description: Enchanted creature gets +2 Attack. When enchanted creature\nis destroyed, a random adjacent creature gets Eternal Sword.
flavor: This weapon was passed down through generations. It never leaves the battlefield.

name: Skythorn
description: Does not count down. When a creature comes into play on your side, Skythorn's Countdown is decreased by 1. When Skythorn's Countdown becomes 0, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: \nIt thrives on life.

passiverules.name: Spiky 1
passiverules.description: When Skythorn is attacked in melee combat, Skythorn deals 1 physical damage to attacking unit.

name: Oculus Cannon
description: Does not count down. When an opponent unit moves to a tile on the same row as Oculus Cannon, Oculus Cannon's Countdown is set to 0.
flavor:
Amhan's foremost invention
was the mechanical eye.

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Void Gate
description: [Physical damage] dealt to Void Gate is instead dealt to the idol behind it.
flavor: The sword slashed right through the churning sphere, seeming almost to fall into the void within.

name: Fields of Strife
description: All Knights have their Attack increased by the number of friendly units on the same row.
flavor: "So many crows!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

name: Fjords of Vigor
description: Units you control costing 3 or less have +1 Attack.
flavor: The mystics have long understood the exceptional properties of the stream.

name: Budding Retreat
description: When a creature comes into play, increase owner's [current] Wild by 1.
flavor: Only the Earthborn ever set foot in the Vaettr glades of Khaile.

name: Clandestine Orchard
description: When a creature comes into play, another [random] creature on the same side has its Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: The Jarls alone know which orchards host the council.

name: Grounds of the Fallen
description: All Humans have +1 Attack and [Magic resistance] 1.
flavor: The only flowers here, are either bone white, or blood red.

name: Caravans of the Expanse
description: Other [Dominion] traits are active.
flavor: The Imperial Logisticians are the true warriors of the Empire.

name: Gravelock Burrows
description: When a Gravelock you control is dealt damage, your other Gravelocks get +1 Attack until end of your turn.
flavor: Like poking a stick in a bee's nest.

name: Fodder Pit
description: All units with [Pillage] have +2 Attack.
flavor: A flock that eats together, stays together.

name: Skull Shrine
description: At the beginning of your turns, increase [current] Energy by 2.
flavor: "Not need proof. Proof here! Skull shrine for gods!"\n- Uhu Longnose

name: Sanctuary of the Lost
description: Undead creatures have [Ward].
flavor: "Here, my command is law!"\n-Irva, Voice of the Dead

name: Halls of Oum Lasa
description: At the beginning of your turn, [sift] 3 random scrolls from your discard pile, and draw 1 of them.
flavor: No rule in the Sanctuary, but Oum Lasa rule.

name: Forbidden Ruins
description: All non-combat damage against idols is increased by 1.
flavor: Callers tread lightly where magic falters.

name: Invocation Sentry
description: When a [Lingering] spell is played, a random opponent idol is dealt 2 damage.
flavor: Mask bearers die, but their power lingers.

name: Banner of Ordinance
description: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Banner of Ordinance to destroy all [Lingering] spells and [heal] adjacent units by 1.
flavor: Unlawful spellcasting will be punished!

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.description: Remove all Lingering spells and heal adjacent units by 1.

name: Stone Enigma
description: All [Lingering] spells are destroyed. Increase Energy by 1.
flavor: This little thing brought down the Mystics of Marnak.

name: Rekindled Spirit
description: Sacrifice target creature you control. Destroy all [Lingering] spells. Draw 2 creature scrolls.
flavor: "Warriors, not tricks!"\n-Jarl Urhald

name: Revenant
description: Revenant is destroyed after attacking.
flavor: Revenants rose in the hundreds; free from conscience, though not from purpose.

passiverules.name: Ward
passiverules.description: Cannot be targeted by opponent spells or enchantments.

name: Slayer Vestige
flavor: Vigilant, Deadly. Eternal.

passiverules.name: Slayer
passiverules.description: When Slayer Vestige deals damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.

name: Mudo Fighter
flavor: To be a fighter among the Mudo, one must defeat both foe and famine.

passiverules.name: Magic resistance 2
passiverules.description: Magic damage dealt to Mudo Fighter is reduced by 2.

name: Flesh Animator
description: When Flesh Animator's Countdown becomes 0, all Undead creatures have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: The Mudo seek out animators even before they die, to make sure they're well cared for.

name: Anima Conduit
description: Whenever a non-<Revenant> creature you control is destroyed, a Revenant is summoned adjacent to Anima Conduit, and Anima Conduit is dealt 1 [pure damage].
flavor: Only in Oum Lasa will you see spirits aid their own unliving corpses in battle.

name: Reloras, Lord Knight
flavor: "There's no one I admire more.\nNo one I'd rather see dead."\n- Jarl Urhald

passiverules.name: Resonance: Adjacent units get
passiverules.description: Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Knight Sergeant
description: When Knight Sergeant's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent Knights have their Countdown decreased by 1.
flavor: A single Knight is formidable. An army of Knights is unstoppable.

name: Stormknight
description: Stormknight has [Move] 2.
flavor: In the Stormknight strategy creed, there's only one sentence; Break their center!

name: Arbalestier
flavor: These bolts will fly straight even after going through a few enemies.

passiverules.name: Piercing
passiverules.description: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

passiverules.name: Resonance: Arbalestier's Count
passiverules.description: Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

name: Squire
description: Other creatures you control on the same row count as Knights.
flavor: Yes, sire. Immediately, sire.

name: Royal Inspiration
description: Draw 1 Knight scroll.
flavor: The knights of Aescalon all favor the same lady.

name: Wings Sorceress
description: When Wings Sorceress's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to remove the last enchantment or effect from target unit.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

abilities.name: Purify
abilities.description: Remove last enchantment or effect from target unit.

name: Effigy of the Queen
description: Units adjacent to Effigy of the Queen have [Magic resistance] 2.
flavor: The Queen protects!

name: Rattle Hymn
description: Destroy a random [Lingering] spell your opponent controls. Draw 1 Lingering spell.
flavor: Echoing the melody of fate.

name: Uhu Longnose
description: When Uhu's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to increase [current] Energy by the number of Gravelocks you control.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

abilities.name: Increase Energy
abilities.description: Increase your current Energy by the number of Gravelocks you control.

name: Gravelock Freak
description: When another Gravelock you control takes damage, Gravelock Freak's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor:
Stone teeth, metal maw.
Rend limb, bone gnaw.

name: Gravelock Guard
flavor: They are the origin of the saying "I smell trouble."

passiverules.name: Pillage: A random opponent uni
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Lockling Brood
description: When Lockling Brood is targeted by a spell or enchantment, Lockling Brood is destroyed.
flavor: Nasty, numerous and not at all cuddly.

name: Snargl
flavor: "Snargl Dodge" is the closest thing to sports among gravelocks.

passiverules.name: Resonance: Snargl's Countdown
passiverules.description: Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

name: Grave Gruel
flavor: Foul and fetid with a hint of nausea.

name: Snargl Brain
description: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack. If Energy is 4 or more, enchanted unit gets +2 Health.
flavor: "Not sure what this organ does, but it's located between its eyes."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

name: Vilda the Verdant
description: Vilda has +1 Attack for each enchantment on your side.
flavor: You wouldn't call a great oak weak just because it is slow to attack.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

passiverules.name: Ward
passiverules.description: Cannot be targeted by opponent spells or enchantments.

name: Nog
flavor: "Classification very hard. I'm pretty sure it's not a plant."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

name: Earthborn Keeper
description: When a unit comes into play on your side, Earthborn Keeper gets +1 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: Two is company, three is a horde.

name: Gusty Izulr
flavor: "Relationship to Nogs unknown. Both have feathers."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Flying
passiverules.description: Gusty Izulr can move to any tile. If that tile is not adjacent to Gusty Izulr, its Countdown is increased by 1.

name: Terrene Brute
description: When a creature comes into play on your side, Terrene Brute's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: "Tread lightly in these woods. These beasts are fidgety."\n- Halm, Berserker

name: Budding Vaettr
description: When a Beast comes into play on your side, increase [current] Growth by 1.
flavor: A Caller's best friend.

name: Earthen Mirth
description: Enchanted unit gets +4 Attack.
flavor: Weapons mean nothing. Motivation is everything.

name: Somata Shift
description: Summon a random creature scroll from your library on target tile. Its Health is set to 2.
flavor: You sure? Extracting souls this way hurts and is closely related to Ilmire arts.

name: Nog Nest
description: When Nog Nest's Countdown becomes 0, Nog Nest is destroyed and 2 <Nogs> are summoned on adjacent tiles.
flavor: Boiling a Nog egg is punishable by death.

name: Snargl Hunter
description: When Snargl Hunter destroys a non-Human creature, increase [current] Energy by 4 at the start of your next turn.
flavor: Hunting in the Carai Range is not for the faint of heart.

name: Slithering Form
description: Enchanted melee unit passes through enemy structures and is immune to damage dealt by structures.
flavor: A body like mist, the heart of a viper.

name: Oum Lasa High Guard
description: Any unit facing Oum Lasa High Guard with no units in between gets -3 Attack and has [Move] 0.
flavor: The High Guard defends the most sacred of all: the remains of the ancestors.

name: Irva, Voice of the Dead
description: When an Undead you control deals damage, Irva makes a ranged attack dealing 2 [physical damage].
flavor: Haunted by a thousand forgotten voices, she speaks.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Snargl Omelette
description: Pay 2 Energy: [Sift] 2 Gravelocks from your library, and draw 1 of them. Use this ability only if you have 0 scrolls in hand.
flavor: The safest way to eat snargl.

abilities.name: Pay 2 Energy
abilities.description: Look at the next 2 Gravelocks in your library, and draw 1 of them.

name: Advantageous Outlook
description: [Sift] 3 scrolls from your library, and draw 1 of them. If it is a spell, Knights you control get +2 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: Nice view!

name: Feedback Jolt
description: Each opponent unit is dealt 2 [magic damage] per attached enchantment.
flavor: "Magic makes an excellent conduit."\n- Amhan, Machine Master

name: Omen of Damnation
description: When an opponent creature comes into play, a random idol on that side is dealt 1 damage.
flavor: "I don't like these marches. I hear Nuru's whispers in the rustling leaves."\n- Jamra, Expedition Leader

name: Aescalon Spires
description: When a unit is destroyed, it is resummoned on the same tile, and Aescalon Spires counts down by 1.
flavor: It is said that the Empire's reach is but a shadow of the Spires.

name: Totem Mask
description: When a structure comes into play, enchanted unit gets +2 Attack and +2 Health.
flavor: "Keep your ring. In comparison, 'tis only a trinket."\n- Jarl Urhald

name: Ashen Vapors
description: [Poison damage] is increased by 1.
flavor: Breathing is for the weak.

name: Infested Husk
description: When Infested Husk is destroyed, a random opponent creature becomes [poisoned].
flavor: "My last expedition to the mire was perilous at best. This is something else entirely."\n- Jamra, Expedition Leader

name: Canister Automaton
description: When Canister Automaton is destroyed in [melee combat], its attacker is dealt 3 [physical damage].
flavor: "It explodes."\n- Grahm, Animator

name: Melt-Iron Shell
flavor: Dyrran blacksmiths think outside the box. Way outside the box.

name: Earthen Splendour
description: Enchanted units you control get +1 Attack and +2 Health.
flavor: A blessing, woven into the humming earth and the keening winds.

name: Steelwood Vindicator
flavor: "Steelwood weaponry is matched only by the shardswords of faraway Ilmire."\n- Siani's Historia, Vol. III

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

name: Mystic's Storm
description: Your [Lingering] spells count up by 2, and your opponent's Lingering spells count down by 3.
flavor: Time moves forward. Mostly.

name: Proud Mercenary
description: Adjacent creatures have +1 Attack.
flavor: The start of the expeditions marked the birth of new trades. Mercenaries, guards and porters all found work aplenty.

name: Shambler Sickness
description: Before attacking, enchanted unit is moved to a random adjacent tile.
flavor: The mire can do strange things to the mind.

name: Lightning Chest
description: Unused Energy is added to your [current] Energy at the start of your next turn.
flavor: Danger, do not touch!

name: Eager to Battle
description: Creatures with [base Attack] 2 or less come into play with [Haste].
flavor: Early bird gets the worm. Hasty hunter gets the bird.\n- Kinfolk saying

name: Coronation
description: Enchanted creature you control has its [base Countdown] set to 1, and gets +6 Attack and +6 Health. When enchanted creature is destroyed, all idols you control are destroyed.
flavor:
Now crowned Queen-Empress,
Caera had Cay deliver unity to
the Empire.

name: Battle Dance
description: Target creature and connected creatures have their Countdown reduced by 1.
flavor: "Qorran waltzes are played in thunderclap."\n- Reaver proverb

passiverules.name: Inspiring: +1 Attack
passiverules.description: When Steelwood Champion comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by +1 until end of turn.

name: Earthboon
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack for each [Lingering] spell in play. Whenever a Lingering spell is played, enchanted unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: Revel in the magic while it lasts.

name: Sleep Moratorium
description: [Sift] 3 random scrolls from your discard pile, and draw 1 of them. Gain current Decay equal to its casting cost.
flavor: In the mire, "Get up and pull yourself together" has a very different meaning.

name: Scout
description: When Scout comes into play, [sift] 3 scrolls from your library. Choose one of them to put on top of your library.
flavor: "You know me, general. I'm just full of ruined surprises."

name: Varas, Essence Eater
description: Varas has +2 Attack for each destroyed idol on the board.
flavor: "Somehow, I drew Varas out of hiding. I wish I hadn't."\n- Atmahs, Imperial Quartermaster

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Miremare
flavor: "Intriguing. I want one!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

passiverules.name: Dominion: +2 Attack and +3 Hea
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

name: Pack Husk
description: When Pack Husk is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
flavor: Death weighs heavy on us all.

name: Corpse Strider
description: When an Undead you control is destroyed, Corpse Strider's Attack and Health are increased by 1.
flavor: "About one in every thousand husks is actually still breathing. Those are the\nones to look out for."\n- Jamra, Expedition Leader

name: Doomteller
description: When Doomteller's Countdown becomes 0, opponent idols take 2 damage.
flavor: "No rush. Their demise is inevitable."

name: Gloomstone Treaty
description: When a non-Decay creature you control is destroyed during your opponent's turn, summon a Revenant in its place.
flavor: One does not lightly sign a treaty with the artifacts of Ilmire.

name: Deathly Grasp
description: Target creature gets [Slayer] until end of turn.
flavor: A blow that leaves no bruises.

name: Essence Garb
description: Enchanted creature gets +1 Attack and +1 Health.
flavor: Fashion that grows on you.

name: Corpse Theft
description: When enchanted creature is destroyed, an Undead copy of that creature is summoned on a random tile on your side.
flavor: "That one's mine."\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

name: Swirling Smoke
description: Target creature and connected creatures have their Countdown increased by 1. Any attached enchantments are destroyed.
flavor: "Deep within the mire, the very air churned with a malice I cannot explain."\n- Frysk, Imperial Scout

name: Expedition Guard
description: Expedition Guard has +1 Attack for each non-Human creature your opponent controls.
flavor: "Don't worry. I'll keep any assailants at bay."\n- Garthe, Expedition Guard

name: Stirring Effigy
flavor: The Empire's greatest never truly die.

passiverules.name: Resonance: A random adjacent c
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

name: Just Conviction
description: Soldiers you control have +1 Attack.
flavor: "My soldiers know what's mine. That's what I like about them."\n- Queen-Empress Caera

name: Resonant Sword
flavor: Think of it as a tuning fork, only sharper.

name: Favored
description: Enchanted unit gets +2 Health.
flavor: After years on the Arren Cape, Cay came to Southport. She stayed but a day, then left with a\nloyal army.

name: Pickaxe Volunteer
flavor: Many hands make light work.

passiverules.name: Idol strike 4
passiverules.description: When Pickaxe Volunteer deals damage to an idol during combat, that idol is dealt an additional 4 damage.

name: Magma Thrower
description: Magma Thrower's Attack is increased by your [current] Energy resource.
flavor: If a problem can't be solved with a gallon of molten rock, it's not worth solving.

name: Blast Automaton
description: When Blast Automaton damages an opponent unit in combat, adjacent units are dealt 1 [physical damage].
flavor: \nNobody knows for sure, but\nsome say each houses a tiny Piddlejack. It's probably nonsense.

passiverules.name: Armor 2
passiverules.description: Physical damage dealt to Blast Automaton is reduced by 2.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Ka Zum Driller
flavor:
"It's made to take on
mountains. Magical rocks
are nothing, really."
- Krys, from Ka Zum

passiverules.name: Pillage: The damaged idol is d
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Assault Battery
flavor: "Hit them hard. Harder! More! Boom!"\n- Enryk, Machine Maker

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

passiverules.name: Surge: X other [random] struct
passiverules.description: When this unit is played, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value (X) is equal to the amount spent.

name: Excogitator
