description: Instead of attacking, Excogitator summons a <Scout Automaton> on an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

abilities.name: Pay 3 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1

name: Controlled Lightning
description: Target unit you control makes a ranged attack, dealing damage equal to its Countdown.
flavor: When they least expect it... that's when lightning strikes.

name: Wind-up Automaton
description: Wind-up counts up instead of down at the beginning of its turn. Pay 3 Energy to increase Attack by Countdown until end of turn. Countdown is set to 0.

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

abilities.name: Pay 3 Energy
abilities.description: Pay 3 Energy to increase Attack by Countdown until end of turn. Countdown is set to 0.

name: Steelwood Dedication
description: If a creature you control is dealt damage during combat, it is then healed by 3.
flavor: Show no fear. The earth will tend to your wounds.

name: Raid
description: Any [Pillage] traits on units you control are activated.
flavor: "Find the stores! Hungry soldiers won't last long in Khaile."

name: Verdant Remnant
description: When Verdant Remnant's Countdown becomes 0, draw 1 creature scroll.
flavor: On the northernmost tip of Reason's End, remnants of a distant past litter the wind-beaten landscape.

passiverules.name: Haste
passiverules.description: Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

name: Consolidator Niara
description: When you play a creature scroll with a subtype not on your side, creatures you control get +2 Attack until end of turn.
flavor: \nThe Consolidator alone can\nsummon the Jarls to council.

passiverules.name: Relentless
passiverules.description: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Spotted Lynx
description: When an opponent creature comes into play, Spotted Lynx's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: "The lynx is a remarkable creature. Its pounce is unmatched by anything roaming these woods."\n- Maans, Forest Keeper

name: Overgrown Menhir
description: When a creature comes into play next to Overgrown Menhir, that creature's Countdown is decreased by 1.
flavor: These stones are more than just symbols. They're the voice of Khaile.

name: Extractor Device
flavor: "This is absolutely awesome! It's... great!"\n- Owin, Machine Operator

name: Stone Recluse
flavor: "Each day's a trial. I tackle them in solitude."\n- Jehb, Khaile recluse

passiverules.name: Pillage: +2 Attack and relentl
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Potency Burst
flavor: "I don't do subtle."\n- Enryk, Machine Maker

name: Keen Warden
flavor: "We're one with this forest - the birds, the bunnies and the snakes."\n- Poy Pohi, Grove Warden

passiverules.name: Pillage: +3 Attack until next
passiverules.description: The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

name: Orz Disruptor
description: When a Human you control deals damage to a unit, opponent's idol on that row is dealt 2 damage.
flavor: The university's all about magic. The disruptors work as a safeguard, should things\ngo wrong.

name: Imperial Scepter
flavor: On the verge of collapse, the city of Ochre brought to the battlefield the Imperial Scepter. In its shadow, the battle turned.

passiverules.name: Resonance: Adjacent units have
passiverules.description: Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

passiverules.name: Unique
passiverules.description: Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

name: Expurgator
description: When Expurgator comes into play, any enchantments on its row are destroyed.
flavor: There was a crackle in the air as the torch purged the air of miasmic dust. There could be no neglect, lest the entire convoy were to fungify.

name: Pack Fowl
flavor: "The burden of Arom makes life easier for the rest of us. It's truly a blessing."\n- Niem, about his pack fowl

passiverules.name: Dominion: While Pack Fowl is i
passiverules.description: Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

name: Aes Moran Scholar
description: When Aes Moran Scholar comes into play, [sift] 3 scrolls from your library, and draw 1 of them.
flavor: "I think about these things, you know? Scrolls and such."\n- Jahk Ob, Aes Moran Scholar

passiverules.name: Ranged attack
passiverules.description: This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

name: Oppressor's Rule
description: Units on one side of a row have their Move decreased by 1 until end of their turn. Any attached enchantments are destroyed.
flavor: Imperial law follows the Empire's expansion. Sometimes, it even precedes it.

name: Keeper's Pledge
description: When a creature comes into play, other creatures on that side get +1 Attack until end of turn.
flavor:
“Jarl, it is not my duty to
fight for you, just to honor
the Pledge.”
- Aer Lindr, Earthborn Keeper

name: Border Treaty
description: Non-Order Human creatures you control have +2 Attack.
flavor: Although mostly short-lived, a succession of treaties followed the end of the rebellion. It's as yet unclear who stands to gain the most from them.

name: Hunter's Treaty
description: If you control creatures from multiple factions, creatures you control have +2 Attack.
flavor: Sometimes, kinship reaches further than family.

name: Reaver's Treaty
description: Units you control with [Pillage] or [Dominion] have +1 Attack.
flavor: The combined might of the reavers and the Mudo finally forced the Empire to withdraw. The rebellion was over; merely a waypoint in history.
